title: 怎么取消粘液科技烟花效果
author: match5630499
txt_content: 如题  望大佬教我如何解决解锁成就时取消烟花效果

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
看起来这个你的插件版本是slimefun v3.xx
禁用烟花的选项是从v4加入的。。。

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
/plugins/Slimefun/config.yml

将里面的
  research-unlock-fireworks: true
  research-give-fireworks: true
改成
  research-unlock-fireworks: false
  research-give-fireworks: false

replies.author: match5630499
replies.txt_content:
